thread.title_full: Inside Bunnings first UK store in St Albans Hertfordshire | Daily Mail Online

author: Ashleigh Davis For Daily Mail Australia
title: Inside Bunnings first UK store in St Albans Hertfordshire | Daily Mail Online
text: Forget hardware, when's the sausage sizzle? Inside Bunnings' first British store - as social media hangs out for the traditional barbecue Photographs have been released of the first-ever Bunnings store in the UK The St Albans store on Griffiths Way is holding its official opening on Thursday The first store outside Australia has generated discussion on social media - with people highly excited about the prospect of a 'sausage sizzle' in the UK One person said: 'Hope Bunnings keep the sausage between two slices of crappy white bread rather than a bun' Another said they hoped it would start a trend of sausage sizzles in London The Australian hardware giant is taking over the Homebase stores in the UK Published: 03:32 GMT, 2 February 2017 | Updated: 07:49 GMT, 2 February 2017 427 shares
